      Fields in <Unnamed> declared as Vector2D 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Vector2D Entity.velocity
      The current velocity of this Entity.
      Methods in <Unnamed> that return Vector2D 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Vector2D Entity.getRelativeVector(double relativeTheta, double distance)
      Returns a velocity vector specified by the given relative angle and magnitude.
      Vector2D Entity.getVector()
      Gets the Vector2D object representing this Entity's velocity.
      static Vector2D Vector2D.getVectorFromDirection(double magnitude, double theta)
      Returns a new Vector2D defined by the indicated magnitude and angle.
      static Vector2D Vector2D.getVectorFromDirection(double magnitude, double x, double y)
      Returns a new Vector2D defined by the indicated magnitude, and x and y components.
      static Vector2D Vector2D.getVectorFromPosition(double dx, double dy)
      Returns a new Vector2D defined by the indicated x component and y component.
      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Vector2D 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
